text: First time here. I heard good things about this place from a colleague so we decided to have a farewell dinner here.  We enjoyed the great ambience as we were seated outside. The music was not too loud, we were probably louder. ðŸ˜… Food was fantastic! I highly recommend the chicken masala pizza. The lamb pizza wasn't as good as the chicken Pizza. The Kilkenny pint was nice as well. Dessert brownie was rich and sweet. I hope to visit again in the future. Keep up the great work.

I had an incredible dining experience at Olive kitchen & bar! From the moment I walked in, the ambiance was warm and inviting, setting the tone for a perfect meal.

The food was absolutely deliciousâ€”each dish was beautifully presented and bursting with flavor. The menu had a great variety, catering to different tastes and dietary preferences.

What truly stood out was the service. Our waiter, Mr. Karim, was exceptional. They were attentive without being intrusive, knowledgeable about the menu, and went out of their way to ensure we had everything we needed. Their friendly and professional demeanor added so much to the experience.

I highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great food and outstanding service. I will definitely be coming back!

Olive Kitchen offers an exceptional dining experience. The food is delicious, the ambiance is inviting, and the staff, including the manager, are fantastic. Highly recommended for a great meal. I've been visiting there for many years, even before COVID, and the food has always been excellent. I absolutely love the place.

Located by Puteri Harbour with scenic view of sail boats docked at the bay. Itâ€™s a bar + fine dine restaurant which serves wide range of Indian cuisine and a little western options too.
Good option for family dine in and chill out with friends. They have indoor and outdoor sittings.
Food portions are big and ideal for sharing.

We had a wonderful dining experience.

What truly made our visit special was the exceptional hospitality. One of the servers Mr, Nayab went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. He was incredibly kind and patient, especially with our childrenâ€™s little bursts of energy and mischief. His calm, friendly demeanor and warm service really stood out and made us feel right at home.

Thank you for such a lovely experience â€” weâ€™ll definitely be coming back!
